creditline: Gift of Loren G. Lipson, M.D.
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: 3/4 length portrait of a Native American man with his hands folded in his lap; landscape behind man with moon in UR corner
text: Hunkpapa Lakota leader Sitting Bull gazes directly the viewer, and brilliant blue beads are energy fields emanating from his silhouette.
title: Moonrise Over Little Bighorn
